subject: express shipping max 4 days
description_text:
Hi

I paid extra to get this delivered in 2-4 days, now i see on my order 
its expected dec 30. it should have been here 2 days ago latest.
Need it before x-mas, if i knew you could not keep what you promise on 
the webpage i would have ordered somewhere else.
Now i have to buy another set of pedals somewhere else and pray i can 
get them before x-mas.

Best regards
Tom Erik

conversations.body_text: Hi Tom Erik Voll, â€‹We apologize for the shipping delay. Please provide your order number.

Order #SSN4821 but it looks like it may be here before x-mas if im 
lucky, its now registered in norway and is getting sorted, if it moves 
on today it should be here tomorrow.

Hi Tom Erik Voll,     Your package has been delivered. Please pick it up at the UPS Access Point location.  Merry Christmas! https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ455510438287301/trackdetails
